name:	NodeType

name:	NodeType[
			prop="value"
		]

// not clear if it would replace with a new FactorialExpr node
RegisterParser(R"


	Expr["type"="int"] as number
	Symbol["value"="!"]


", [ast, ctx](Array){
	ast.rm last 2.			// remove last 2 ast nodes

	return 0
	return AstNode {...}	// attach new ast node at the end
})


RegisterParser(R"

	Identifier["value"="factorial"] as funcName
	Parameters {
		Expr["type"="int", "isConst"="true"] as intConstParam
	}

", [ast, ctx](Array){
	ast.rm last 2.			// remove last 2 ast nodes

	return 0
	return AstNode {...}	// attach new ast node at the end
})


RegisterParser(R"

	FunctionCall {
    Identifier["value"="factorial"] as funcName
    Parameters {
        Expr["type"="int", "isConst"="true"] as intConstParam
    }
}

", [ast, ctx](Array){
	ast.rm last 2.			// remove last 2 ast nodes

	return 0
	return AstNode {...}	// attach new ast node at the end
})
